title: Skill Data Table Schema
description: YAML schema for skill table Vec<SkillDataTable>

skill_group.description:
The skill's original user group.
Values:
Ally | Enemy | Universal

target.description:
The skill's target type.
Values:
Player | AnyButSelf | NoneButSelf |
 Ally | AllyButSelf | AllyAOE |
 Enemy | EnemyAOE | Any

mana.description: Default mana cost, a negative value would restore mana instead

block.description: Default block value, a negative value would decrease block instead

heal.description: Default heal value, a negative value would decrease health instead

channel.description: Amount of turns the caster needs to be idle before activating, minimum value is 1 which will make the skill cast at the start of the caster's next turn

learned.description: Whether if the skill is learned
